upload_description: Upload an image to search for similar images in your selected folders.
upload_prompt: Drag and drop or click to upload image files (JPG, PNG, BMP, WEBP)
search_button_help: Click to start searching for similar images in selected folders
search_requirements: Please upload an image and select at least one folder before starting the search.
sorted_by: Results sorted by similarity from high to low
no_results: No similar images found. Try another image or select different folders.
image_load_error: Error loading image. Please ensure you've uploaded a valid image file.
index_build_failed: Failed to build index. Please check if folder paths are correct.
model_help: CLIP models are better for semantic similarity, ResNet is better for visual similarity.
custom_model_help: Enter Hugging Face model name, e.g. 'openai/clip-vit-base-patch32'
custom_model_required: Model name is required when using a custom model
reset_model_help: Clear current loaded model and free memory
result_count_help: Set the number of most similar images to return
force_rebuild_help: Check this to ignore cache and rebuild the index (slower but resolves cache issues)
file_explorer_help: Browse and select folders containing images
select_folders: Please select at least one folder containing images
manual_input_label: Enter one folder path per line
folder_required: Please select at least one folder containing images first
browse_folders: Browse and select folders to search
no_gpu_warning: No GPU detected. CPU will be used for processing (slower)
streamlit_folium_error: streamlit-folium not installed. Please use manual path input.
all_paths_invalid: All provided paths are invalid. Please check folder paths.
invalid_paths: The following paths are invalid or don't exist:
clear_index_help: Delete all index cache files. Index will be rebuilt on next search
clear_model_help: Delete downloaded model files. They will be re-downloaded when needed
clear_model_warning: Warning: Clearing model cache will delete all downloaded model files. They will be re-downloaded when needed.
model_in_use_warning: Model is currently in use. Please reset the model before clearing cache.
about_content:
# Picture Sherlock
[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-View_Source-blue?logo=github&style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/CN-Scars/picture_sherlock)

This application uses pretrained deep learning models to extract image features and search for similar images in your local image library.

## Technology Stack
- Python
- Streamlit (UI)
- PyTorch (Deep Learning)
- CLIP/ResNet50/Custom models (Pretrained models)

## How to Use
1. Select a feature extraction model
2. Select image library folders
3. Upload a query image
4. Click "Start Search" button
5. Wait for search results

## Tips
- On first use, the model will download and load, which may take some time
- Initial scanning of large image libraries may be time-consuming
- CLIP model provides better semantic matching but may be slower
- ResNet50 model is faster but may not be as good at semantic understanding
- Custom models allow using other compatible Hugging Face models
model_name_required: Model name is required when using a custom model
no_folders_selected: Please select at least one folder containing images
model_not_ready: Model is not ready yet. Please check settings
missing_dependencies: Missing required dependencies: {deps}. Please install using pip install {deps}.
clip_model_load_failed: Unable to load CLIP model '{model_name}'. Error: {error}
custom_model_load_failed: Unable to load custom model '{model_name}'. Error: {error}
resnet_model_load_failed: Unable to load ResNet50 model. Error: {error}
unsupported_model_type: Unsupported model type: {model_type} or missing required dependencies
cache_management_description: Manage model index caches to optimize application performance and resource usage
delete_help: Delete this cache and related files
delete_record_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this search record?
repeat_search_help: Re-execute this search with the same parameters
clear_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all search history? This action cannot be undone.
no_favorites: No favorites yet. Click the favorite button in search history to add favorites!
unfavorite_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to unfavorite all records?
unfavorite_all_description: This will remove the favorite status from all search records, but won't delete the records themselves.
cleanup_orphaned_images_help: Clean up query image files without corresponding records
cleanup_images_description: This operation will delete query image files that don't have corresponding history records, freeing up storage space.
cleanup_images_warning: This operation cannot be undone. Please confirm to continue.
cleanup_success: Successfully cleaned up {count} orphaned image files
search_results_no_data: Search Results: No result data (legacy record)
search_params_set: Search parameters set, please re-upload image to search
repeat_search_success: Search completed! Found {count} results in {time:.2f} seconds
no_tags_yet: No tags yet. Add tags to search records in history to see tag statistics here.
